short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: A screensaver of Yuri from doki doki literature club (DDLC) game with 2 different animations to spend time with Yuri.
short.de: Ein Bildschirmschoner von Yuri von doki doki Literatur Club (DDLC) Spiel mit 2 verschiedenen Animationen Zeit mit Yuri zu…
short.es: Un protector de pantalla de Yuri de juego Doki Doki club de la literatura (DDLC) con 2 animaciones diferentes para pasar tiempo con…
short.fr: Un économiseur d'écran de Yuri de Doki jeu club de littérature Doki (DDLC) avec 2 animations différentes pour passer du temps avec…
short.it: Uno screensaver di Yuri da Doki Doki letteratura club (DDLC) partita con 2 diverse animazioni di trascorrere del tempo con Yuri.
short.ja: 2つの異なるアニメーションでドキドキ文学クラブ（DDLC）ゲームからユーリのスクリーンセーバーは、ユーリとの時間を過ごすために。
short.ko: 2 개 개의 다른 애니메이션 두근 두근 문학 클럽 (DDLC) 게임에서 유리의 스크린 세이버 유리와 함께 시간을 보낼 수 있습니다.
short.nl: Een screensaver van Yuri van doki doki literatuur club (DDLC) spel met 2 verschillende animaties om tijd door te brengen met Yuri.
short.ru: Заставка Юрия от DOKI игры доки литература клуб (DDLC) с 2-мя различными анимациями, чтобы провести время с Юрием.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension displays a screensaver of Yuri with 2 different animations from Doki Doki Literature Club:

Youtube Preview https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ID6kUZn-oK0
Website - https://kronosdevstudio.com

Features:

* 2 different animated wallpapers/screensavers.
* Wait time after machine becomes idle to display screensaver
* A scheduler to control when the screensaver, display, and computer should remain on
* Background sound
* Do not display over full screen Chrome windows (e.g., YouTube, Netflix)
* Do not show screensaver when a media (e.g. Video, Audio) is playing
* Do not show screensaver when browser is minimized
* Display time
* Show on all displays
* Support multiple languages

Works great on all platforms.

Please rate this if you find it of value. Thank you.

Social Links:

* Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/kronosdevstudio
* Twitter - https://twitter.com/kronosdevstudio

Disclaimer:

This is a fan made extension. I do not own any images or audio content used in this extension. All credit and rights goes to the creater of game.
long.de,es,fr,it,nl:
This extension displays a screensaver of Yuri with 2 different animations from Doki Doki Literature Club:

Features:

* 2 different animated wallpapers/screensavers.
* Wait time after machine becomes idle to display screensaver
* Background sound
* A scheduler to control when the screensaver, display, and computer should remain on
* Do not display over full screen Chrome windows (e.g., YouTube, Netflix)
* Do not show screensaver when a media (e.g. Video, Audio) is playing
* Do not show screensaver when browser is minimized
* Show on all displays
* Display time

Works great on all platforms.

Please rate this if you find it of value. Thank you.

* Privacy Statement

This program does not store or transmit any sensitive or personal user data.
